name: Kojima
string:
Hey, how are YOU
doing?
<name>bHow are YOU
doing?
<name>aHow are YOU
doing?
<name>ZOK, enough. I've
been working too
much lately… I
want to be a kid
again…

<name>aI know. When I
was a kid, all I
did was play.
I did all sorts
of mischief.

<name>ZOh, yeah. Ding
ーDong Ditch…
<name>aYes! You knock
on someone's
door and before
they come out,
you run away!

<name>ZI did it
somewhat
differently. I
would disguise
myself so that
they wouldn't
know it was me.
Then I would
just knock on
the door and
run!

name: Otose
string:
Was it really
necessary?
<name>ZThen someone
would come out
and say, “Who is
it? Oh, Kojima.”

name: Otose
string:
Then why did you
disguise
yourself!?

<name>ZWell…
<name>aAnyway, do you
rememer kids who
would put push
pins on
someone's chair?

<name>ZYes. I did that
too. And someone
who sat on the
push pins would
say, “Ouch, I'm
not a poster!”

name: Otose
string:
What kind of kid
would respond so
nicely to that!?

<name>ZHow about
sticking a piece
of paper saying
“Stupid” on
someone's back?

<name>aOh, right. I'd
tap on someone's
back when I was
saying 'Hi', and
secretly stick
the paper on
them.

<name>ZI went to my
5thーyear class
reunion the
other day, and
one guy still
had a paper I
put on his back.

name: Otose
string:
You liar! Who
wouldn't notice
it for 5 years?

<name>ZHe takes a
shower with his
clothes on.

<name>aYou are such a
liar! I can't
handle it any
more!
